subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
lead_paragraph: Craft was a defensive back and halfback who played for the Eagles from 1946 to 1953 and for the Pittsburgh Steelers from 1953 to 1955.
snippet: Craft was a defensive back and halfback who played for the Eagles from 1946 to 1953 and for the Pittsburgh Steelers from 1953 to 1955.
